name: Koala Lumpur: Journey to the Edge
name_original: Koala Lumpur: Journey to the Edge
description:
Koala Lumpur: Journey to the Edge is an adventure game developed by Red Orb Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1997. Broderbund Software published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Koala Lumpur: Journey to the Edge on PC.
